title: Sell Extra Añejo Tequila
metaTitle: Sell Extra Añejo Tequila | Tears of Llorona, Fuenteseca, Patron | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Extra Añejo Tequila. We buy Tears of Llorona, Fuenteseca, Patron 7 Anos, and limited edition high-end tequila. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy premium Extra Añejo and high-end Tequila.
introParagraph: Extra Añejo tequila represents the pinnacle of agave aging, often rivaling the complexity of fine cognac or whiskey. We purchase premium Extra Añejo bottles from producers like Tears of Llorona, Fuenteseca, Patron, and Don Julio. If you have a collection of high-end tequila, sell directly to us for a competitive offer.
whatWeBuy: Jose Cuervo Reserva de la Familia (older wooden boxes)
photoChecklist: Box condition (Extra Añejos often have elaborate boxes)
pricingFactors: Brand prestige (Tears of Llorona is top tier)
Age statement (Fuenteseca 18 or 21 year is extremely valuable)

faqs.question: Do you buy Tears of Llorona?
faqs.answer: Yes, we actively buy Tears of Llorona, one of the most respected Extra Añejos on the market.

faqs.question: Is Jose Cuervo Reserva valuable?
faqs.answer: Older vintages (often in wooden boxes with artist designs) are valuable. Recent releases are common.

faqs.question: Do you buy Don Julio 1942?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy single bottles of 1942 as it is widely available, unless it is an older bottling or part of a larger lot.

faqs.question: Do you buy Clase Azul Ultra?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the high-end Clase Azul releases like Ultra and Dia de Muertos.

faqs.question: What is Fuenteseca?
faqs.answer: Fuenteseca releases some of the oldest aged tequilas ever bottled. These are highly collectible.

faqs.question: How do I ship the heavy box?
faqs.answer: Extra Añejo boxes can be heavy and fragile. Pack carefully with plenty of cushioning.
